txt.en:
'Hmm. There's something about this chamber, [placeholder], and it's not the hobgoblins. Well, it's not just the hobgoblins.'

Imák sniffs the air.

'Yes, there is something peculiar about the air in here. You know my sense of smell is highly refined, do you not? Well, something here is a bother to it, and I don't like it.'
Fastrith is outside Shakhajât, waiting for you and Bori to bring her to Zul-mazal to examine the interesting mosaic.
Talk to Fastrith and travel with her to Zul-mazal
Imák is standing in Zul-mazal, waiting to speak with you.
'Stáli the Hewer will surely be interested in examining our discovery, [placeholder]. Does his apprentice care to see it, and confirm if I am right?'
Bori believes that Stáli the Hewer would be interested in the mosaic you found in Zul-mazal, and suggested that his apprentice Fastrith Hawkfeast take a look on behalf of her master.

'How odd that we should discover a broken mosaic on the same day we encounter an apprentice to one renowned for the study and restoration of such works of art?\n\n'Stáli the Hewer will surely be interested in examining our discovery, [placeholder]. Does his apprentice care to see it, and confirm if I am right?'
'A broken mosaic? I can certainly take a look. With Shakhajât apparently free of any of the Zabad'ibîn, I have the rest of the day free.\n\n'Let me know where to go, [placeholder].'
